content:
Sure! Here are some shorter and playful options for Twitter:

1. Hang ten with your fur baby on Maui's Road to Hana! 🤙🏄‍♀️🌴🌺 #RoadtoHana #PetFriendly #MauiLife
2. 🐶 + 🚗 + 🌊 = Perfect day trip! Hit the Road to Hana with your furry friend 🌴🐾 #PetFriendly #RoadtoHana #MauiLife
3. Don't leave your fur baby at home! Discover Maui's best sights together on Road to Hana 🌴🐾🌺 #PetFriendly #RoadtoHana #MauiLife
4. Ready to unleash some adventure? Bring your pup and explore Road to Hana's scenic spots! 🌺🌴🐾 #PetFriendly #RoadtoHana #MauiLife
5. Say aloha to an epic day trip with your furry companion! 🐶🌴🌺 Hit the Road to Hana for stunning views and pet-friendly fun 🌊🐾 #PetFriendly #RoadtoHana #MauiLife

Note: Character limits for Twitter are 280 characters.
